p: However, other alternative ways used to induce mucosal immunity are currently available. These include the following: intranasal vaccinations using inactivated whole or split influenza vaccines , 65, 66 sublingual administration of adjuvanted influenza vaccines, 67 and novel types of LAIVs, for example, formulated by depleting the NS1 gene. NS1 encodes for a non‐structural protein, resulting in attenuated viruses (DelNS1 viruses) unable to overcome the anti‐viral defenses of infected cells. 37, 68
